text: Owen Frederick Bieber (;Sawyer, "In Troubled Detroit, the UAW to Follow 'a Guy You Can Trust'," The Washington Post, November 22, 1982. December 28, 1929 â€“ February 17, 2020) was an American labor union activist. He was president of the United Auto Workers (UAW) from 1983 to 1995. He was born in Dorr Township, Michigan. Bieber died on February 17, 2020 in Detroit at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== *UAW Web site * Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Detroit
title: Owen Bieber
